title: Track Crude Oil Tanker Shipment
description: A supply scheduler tracks the progress of a VLCC (Very Large Crude Carrier) bringing crude oil from Saudi Arabia to a refinery in Texas.

tasks.description: Using the vessel's name or IMO number, find its current location, speed, and heading via an AIS tracking service.
tasks.expected_outcome: The vessel's current position is displayed on a map.

tasks.description: Calculate the vessel's estimated time of arrival (ETA) at the destination port based on its current speed and route.
Update the refinery's crude receiving schedule with the new ETA.
tasks.expected_outcome: The terminal's schedule is updated to reflect the vessel's new arrival time.
